title: CORPUS FUND
clause_text: CORPUS FUND.—A Corpus fund shall be created by the Planning Authority as directed by the Empowered Committee, which will be utilised for maintenance of the rehabilitation buildings for a period of 10 years.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-
